prod_desc: Help Moana find the heart of Te Fiti and fulfill her destiny!
prod_long_desc:
Explore the beautiful world of Disney’s Moana with Moana’s Island Adventure. Recreate memorable scenes from the movie as Moana learns about the legends of her ancestors, finds the heart of Te Fiti and plays the drums in the cave. Then create new adventures of your own, living out island life in and around her house with Pua her pet pig. Includes a Moana mini-doll, plus Pua the pig.
Includes a Moana mini-doll figure, plus her pet pig Pua.
Moana’s Island Adventure features Moana’s house with a fire for cooking and a cave area with waterfall.
Moana’s house features a bed, table, basket for fish and a map of Te Fiti.
Fire features rotating pole for cooking fish.
Cave area features special drums, a palm tree and a waterfall with secret reveal function.
Accessory elements include a banana, coconut bowl, pineapple, two fish, shell, oar and the heart of Te Fiti.
Enjoy the tropical fruit with Moana and cook fresh fish on the rotisserie while you learn about her ancestors.
Head to the waterfall and use the secret reveal function to find the heart of Te Fiti.
Play the drums in the cave to find out if Moana should embark on her epic voyage to restore harmony to Te Fiti.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Moana’s house measures over 5” high, 9” wide and 3” long.
Cave area with waterfall measures over 3” high, 4” wide and 1” long.
Combine with 41150 Moana’s Ocean Voyage to continue the adventure.
